# withFullDate | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  withFullDate 

Type Property# withFullDate

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withFullDate: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/ISO8601DateFormatter/Options/withFullDate#Discussion)

The date representation includes the year, month, and day. Equivalent to specifying [`withYear`](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withyear), [`withMonth`](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withmonth), and [`withDay`](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withday)
